main-page.main-title: Book hotels, apartments and unique destinations around the world
main-page.second-title: Find the perfect destination for your holiday
main-page.about-us: Welcome to our accommodation booking site! We help millions of travelers find and book accommodations around the world. Our mission is to make your vacation comfortable and unforgettable. With us you can find both cozy apartments in the city center and unique places to relax away from the hustle and bustle.
main-page.advantage-description-choosing: from budget hostels to luxury hotels
main-page.advantage-description-security: reliable reservation and data protection system
main-page.advantage-description-support: our support team is always available to help you at any time
main-page.advantage-description-reviews: read reviews and choose the best accommodation

auth.auth-description: Ready to become part of th exclusive club? Fill in the details below, and let the journey begin!
auth.error-password-pattern: Password should have a letter, a big letter, number ans more than 7 symbols
auth.error-password-patternLikeEmail: Password shouldn't be like an your email
auth.error-passwordRepeat-pattern: Password should be the same like a previous field
auth.login-description: We are excited to have you back! Log in now and access your account.
